title: NURBGen: High-Fidelity Text-to-CAD Generation through LLM-Driven NURBS Modeling
data:

Generating editable 3D CAD models from natural language remains challenging, as 
existing text-to-CAD systems either produce meshes or rely on scarce design-history 
data. We present NURBGen, the first framework to generate high-fidelity 3D CAD 
models directly from text using Non-Uniform Rational B-Splines (NURBS). To 
achieve this, we fine-tune a large language model (LLM) to translate free-form texts 
into JSON representations containing NURBS surface parameters (\textit {ie}, control
